EmailTemplate.name: Decoding Grocery (Phase 2).Send Email 1.Subject Line Test
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar: The Power of Self-Checkout for Post-COVID Grocers
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The true power of self-checkout in post-pandemic grocery strategies ${CTAText} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> {{lead.First Name:default=Valued Customer}}, as a grocer, you’re adapting to new shopper patterns—quickly.
You’re modifying operations. Trying to meet new regulations and mandates. Adjusting to consumers who shop differently.
One emerging trend? Self-checkout as post-COVID strategy. It makes sense, seeing that 49% of shoppers say they’ll use it more than they used to.
But what is the real power of self-checkout? And can it transform your strategy beyond just the front end? Find out in our new webinar. ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]>
